about_the_game:
If you thought Pretend Cars Racing was great, you will love what we have done with this new game!

Pretend Cars Racing 2, as its predecessor, is an old school top-down racer, featuring split-screen multiplayer, with a driving model has the right mix between arcade and simulation. You will be having fun in no time but with its high skill ceiling, you will spend hours chasing your best possible lap time, whether you are racing AIs, friends or the top spot in the global leaderboards.

TRACK EDITOR AND CUSTOMIZATION

You will be able to recreate your favorite tracks or create the track of your dreams with a simple to use Track Editor. Customization doesn't end there, you will be able to personalize drivers looks and names.

NIGHT AND DAY TRANSITIONS

Race at any time of day and enjoy endurance events with real-time or accelerated time of day, with varying light conditions.

NEW PHYSICS MODELLING

A completely new physics model improves handling and feel of the cars and the possibility to have FWD, RWD and AWD cars. It brings the game closer to simulation, without losing its arcade spirit.

IMPROVED VISUAL EFFECTS

The new lightning system is not the only visual change in the game, with new particles effects, sounds and permanent skidmarks, races feel more alive than ever.

movies.name: Race at Bridgehampton with day and night transitions

name: Pretend Cars Racing 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 and above
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU for night races
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: An old school top-down racer with split-screen multiplayer, track editor and night and day transitions.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
